title: Harin and Fonseka in verbal clash in SJB May Day Rally
body_lines: SJB MPs Harin Fernando and Sarath Fonseka were seen having a verbal clash at the SJB May Day Rally held in Colombo today.
Parliamentarian Fonseka, who was seated in the front row, was seen calling MP Fernando near him and both were seen enaged in a verbal clash.
Parliamentarian Manusha Nanayakkara Mediated and setteled the dispute by removing Fernando from the place.
